bio.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"David Rivera Bozón is a Colombian tenor based in Boston, recognized internationally for his extraordinary talent and warm personality.  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\nMr. Bozon has performed extensively bringing his music to a wide variety of communities. Given his labor, he has been recognized by the Massachusetts Senate and House of Representatives for their outstanding engagement in cultural and arts events for projects in the State of Massachusetts, and the Pirandello Liceum for his outstanding contribution the Italian Heritage in the United States of America. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Some recent engagements include Mario Cavaradossi from Tosca with Opera 51, Nemorino from Elisir d'Amore with Boston Opera Collaborative, Werther with Barn Opera, Alfredo from Traviata with MassOpera, and Pinkerton from Madama Butterfly with Central City Opera. La Resurrección de la Fe with the Philarmonic Orchestra of Bogotá, and An Opera Celebration featuring the UNAL Choir and Orchestra. La Misa Criolla with Assabet Valley Mastersingers, Chariot Jubilee with Nashoba Valley Chorale, Mozart Requiem with Masterworks Chorale, Music for a Better Tomorrow: A recital pro-NAGLY with Felix Jarrar.  Head of The Charles' Guest Artist 22/23, and Music by Carol Koffinke with Milton Community Concerts. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Some upcoming performances are Fritz from L’Amico Fritz with West End Lyric, Turiddu with Opera51, and the Cabaret Alegria at Club Café in Boston, and The Tastes of Thanksgiving at The Arctic Playhouse in Rhode Island. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"David is a New England Conservatory's Master of Music and the National University of Colombia Conservatory's Bachelor.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"For more information, visit ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://dbrtenor.com"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"DRBTenor.com","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
